text: Bardello con Malgesso e Bregano is a comune in the Province of Varese in the Lombardy region in Italy. It was created on 1 January 2023 from the former municipalities of Bardello, Bregano and Malgesso. Category:2023 establishments in Europe Category:2020s establishments in Italy Category:Settlements in Varese
title: Bardello con Malgesso e Bregano
